title: Inception
description: A skilled thief is given a chance at redemption if he can successfully perform inception.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, and others intertwine in a tale of violence and redemption.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who wants to plunge Gotham into anarchy.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The story of a man with a low IQ who achieves great things in life.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker and a soap salesman form an underground fight club.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over years, finding solace and eventual redemption.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Gladiator
description: A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.
